verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: announced] [ARG1: a 25 percent tariff on up to $ 50 billion worth of Chinese imports] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-ADV: instantly escalating a trade dispute between the world 's two largest economies] .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] announced a 25 percent tariff on up to $ 50 billion worth of Chinese imports on Friday , [ARGM-MNR: instantly] [V: escalating] [ARG1: a trade dispute between the world 's two largest economies] .
